body_html:
I am using python 3.5 with Linux mint. After I installed cudnn (https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn) and mkl-dnn (https://github.com/01org/mkl-dnn), I uninstalled tensorflow-gpu once:
sudo python3.5 -m pip uninstall tensorflow-gpu
Then installed again:
sudo python3.5 -m pip install tensorflow-gpu
And tensorflow worked without "libmklml_intel.so" error for some reason.

body:
I am using python 3.5 with Linux mint. After I installed cudnn (https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn) and mkl-dnn (https://github.com/01org/mkl-dnn), I uninstalled tensorflow-gpu once:
sudo python3.5 -m pip uninstall tensorflow-gpu
Then installed again:
sudo python3.5 -m pip install tensorflow-gpu
And tensorflow worked without "libmklml_intel.so" error for some reason.
